sn35.20:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpe abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn35.20:1.2: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.20:1.8: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.20:2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpe nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn35.20:2.2: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.20:2.8: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
